title: Zero Flux
description: An alternative cover edition for this ASIN can be found hereLuka and Mairwen (Overload Flux) take on a very cold case, a secret lab, and the find of a lifetime. Which one of them is worth killing for? Forensic investigator Luka Foxe had gladly left his troubled past far behind, so only a plea from his old friend and mentor to investigate a violent crime scene frozen in an ice cave could have lured him back. Unfortunately, his old friend knows far more than he's telling, which could get them all killed, even with security specialist Mairwen Morganthur on their side. An unexpected ice fall reveals a hidden lab buried deep in a mountain and the find of a lifetime. Now someone is trying to make sure those secrets stay frozen in time, even if it means more deaths...---------------------Zero Flux is a 17,000-word novella that is best enjoyed after reading Overload Flux, the novel that introduces Luka, Mairwen, and the worlds of the Central Galactic Concordance.Includes a bonus free chapter from Minder Rising, the standalone second novel in the Central Galactic Concordance series.The Central Galactic Concordance series:-- Overload Flux (Book 1) – standalone-- Minder Rising (Book 2) – standalone-- Zero Flux (Novella 2.5) – sequel to Overload Flux
author: Carol Van Natta
